description.message: Finds the next [>] URL link and lets you plus [+] numbers in a URL

title.description: Extension title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

popup_next_input.description: Next input button title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

popup_prev_input.description: Prev input button title (tool tip) shown when hovered.

popup_clear_input.description: Clear input button title (tool tip) when hovered.

popup_next_prev_setup_input.description: Next Prev input button title (tool tip) when hovered.

popup_plus_minus_setup_input.description: Plus Minus input button title (tool tip) when hovered.

popup_plus_minus_setup_h3.message: Select the part of the URL to plus [+] or minus [-]

popup_base_case_lowercase_label.description: Base case lowercase input radio label.

popup_base_case_uppercase_label.description: Base case uppercase input radio label.

popup_oops_error.description: Beginning line of popup error message.

popup_selection_blank_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection is blank.

popup_selection_notalphanumeric_error.message: Selection can only contain alphanumeric characters
popup_selection_notalphanumeric_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection is not alphanumeric.

popup_selection_notinurl_error.message: Selection has to be part of the URL
popup_selection_notinurl_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection is not part of the URL.

popup_selection_base_error.message: Select a higher base to match characters in selection
popup_selection_base_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selection doesn't match the base.

popup_selectionstart_invalid_error.message: Selection position must be from URL
popup_selectionstart_invalid_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the selectionStart is invalid.

popup_interval_invalid_error.message: Interval has to be 1 or higher
popup_interval_invalid_error.description: Plus Minus Setup error message if the interval is 0 or negative.

options_keyboard_shortcuts_p.message: Keyboard Shortcuts are configured via Chrome. If Quick is enabled, you can Next [>] or Plus [+] instantly without having to enter Setup.

options_keyboard_shortcuts_quick_enable_.description: Enable Quick Keyboard Shortcuts checkbox label.

options_default_settings_p.message: You can have URL Next Plus use these values by default when you use Quick Keyboard Shortcuts or inside Setup.

options_default_mode_next_prev_option.message: Use the Next [>] and Prev [<] links on the page

options_default_links_innerHTML_option.message: Prefer links with words like "Next" in them

options_base_case_lowercase_label.description: Base case lowercase input radio label.

options_base_case_uppercase_label.description: Base case uppercase input radio label.
